extension.title: Chrome Extension
extension.subtitle: Sync your saved Instagram posts
extension.description: The SavorPilot Chrome extension allows you to sync your saved Instagram posts directly to your account. Your session cookies are used securely to fetch your saved posts.
extension.downloadFailed: Failed to download extension. Please try again.

download.title: Download Extension
download.description: Click the button below to download the SavorPilot Chrome extension files.

extract.title: Extract Files
extract.description: Unzip the downloaded file to a folder on your computer (e.g., Documents/SavorPilot-Extension).

openChrome.title: Open Chrome Extensions
openChrome.description: Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions or click Menu → More Tools → Extensions.

developerMode.title: Enable Developer Mode
developerMode.description: Toggle on "Developer mode" in the top-right corner of the Extensions page.

loadExtension.title: Load Extension
loadExtension.description: Click "Load unpacked" and select the folder where you extracted the extension files.

pinExtension.title: Pin Extension
pinExtension.description: Click the puzzle icon in Chrome toolbar and pin SavorPilot for easy access.

usageSteps.step1: Make sure you're logged into Instagram in Chrome
usageSteps.step2: Make sure you're logged into SavorPilot in Chrome
usageSteps.step3: Click the SavorPilot extension icon in your toolbar
usageSteps.step4: Click "Sync Saved Posts" to import your saved posts
usageSteps.step5: Your posts will appear on this page ready for import!
